before.title: 🌙 Lunaclick is Coming! 🌙
before.label2: Brace yourself for a spectacular Lunar New Year event! Lunaclick, the ultimate clicking challenge, is coming soon. Get set to click, earn, and win big with VERSE!

during.title: 🎊 Lunaclick is Here! Join the Celebration! 🎊
during.label2: The wait is over! Step into the festive world of Verse Clicker, accumulate points, and grab your chance to win exciting rewards in VERSE. Ready, set, click!

after.title: 🏮 Lunaclick Has Concluded! 🏮
after.label2: Thank you for participating in Lunaclick! The event may have ended, but the excitement lives on. Check out the leaderboard to see your ranking. Prizes will be paid out soon.
